Investigation unique ID: Identifier comprising the unique name of the institution/database hosting the submission of the investigation data, and the accession number of the investigation in that institution.
Investigation description: Human-readable text describing the investigation in more detail.
Submission date: Date of submission of the dataset presently being described to a host repository.
Public release date: Date of first public release of the dataset presently being described.
License: License for the reuse of the data associated with this investigation. The Creative Commons licenses cover most use cases and are recommended.
Associated publication: An identifier for a literature publication where the investigation is described. Use of DOIs is recommended.

Investigation title: Experimental data: Field Phenotyping of Ten Wheat Cultivars under Elevated CO2 Shows Seasonal Differences in Chlorophyll Fluorescence, Plant Height and Vegetation Indices
Investigation description: Experiment is part of the "Big baking" project. Higher CO2 concentrations change the growth dynamics of the C3 plant wheat. Higher yields are accompanied by lower protein contents. Field trials under an atmosphere with increased CO2 levels (FACE experiments) are intended to depict future scenarios and show the effect on the protein composition and baking quality of wheat. Previous breeding objectives may have to be reconsidered. The experimental data consist of the LIFT, PhenoCam, UAV, yield and environmental data.
